title: Which is the best platform for writing about anything online? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you want to share your fiction or non-fiction online, there are a number of good options. Wattpad: Wattpad - Stories You'll Love - There’s a whole community and ecosystem here, and though I’ve never used it, I’ve heard good things about it.Medium dot com: Basically a very sophisticated blog platform in the format of a slick online magazine. It’s a really good (no pun intended) medium for sharing your writing online because it’s easy to use and your stories are formatted and presented professionally, so people take it more seriously. You can even create “magazines” of your own with content from multiple writers. Medium – Read, write and share stories that matterIf you’re writing fanfiction (that is, stories based on existing media franchises like movies, TV shows or novel series), FanFiction dot net is one of the best places to post. FanFictionYou can set up your own blog on sites like WordPress.com: Create a free website or blog or Blogger.com - Create a unique and beautiful blog. It’s easy and free or create a self-hosted blog on your own website.There are other outlets listed in this article, but it dates back to 2014, so some of the entries may be obsolete by now. 14 Free Platforms To Share Your Short Stories Online — Epic Brand Storytelling
